history.proof: intros. qsimpl use: mm_progress_INC. qsimpl use: mm_progress_INC. qsimpl use: mm_progress_INC,mm_sss_INC_inv. qsimpl use: mm_progress_INC,mm_sss_INC_inv. sauto depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: apply mm_progress_INC in Hst1 as H1.
apply mm_progress_INC in Hst2 as H2.
apply mm_sss_INC_inv in H1 as [H11 H12].
apply mm_sss_INC_inv in H2 as [H21 H22].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (x : pos n) (i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), INCₐ x // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> j = 1 + i /\\ w = v[(S (v#>x))/x]" on hypothesis of type "forall (x : pos n) (i : nat) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), INCₐ x // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> j = S i".

exceptions.tactic: apply mm_sss_sind with (m := INCₐ x) (m0 := (i, v)) (m1 := (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])).
exceptions.exn: The reference i was not found in the current environment.

original: intros. intros Hst1 Hst2. apply mm_progress_INC in Hst1 as H1. apply mm_progress_INC in Hst2 as H2. apply mm_sss_INC_inv in H1 as [H11 H12]. apply mm_sss_INC_inv in H2 as [H21 H22]. apply mm_sss_sind with (m := INCₐ x) (m0 := (i, v)) (m1 := (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])). - auto. - auto. - auto.
